net.tridentsdk.api.factory

Class ReflectFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.api.factory.ReflectFactory

  • public class ReflectFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides reflection accessors to the ReflectASM library wrappers

        Parameters:
        cls - the default class to wrap
        Returns:
        the wrapped class

      • getClass

        public FastClass getClass(java.lang.Object o)
        Acquires a class wrapper. Note this method is extremely slow.
        Parameters:
        o - the instance representing the class you need
        Returns:
        the wrapped class

      • getField

        public FastField getField(java.lang.Object o,
                 java.lang.String name)
        Acquires a wrapper for faster reflective manipulation
        Parameters:
        o - the instance to get the field from
        name - the name of the declared field
        Returns:
        the wrapped field

      • getField

        public FastField getField(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                 java.lang.String name)
        Acquires a field wrapper in the same fashion as getMethod(Object, String), but for static fields
        Parameters:
        cls - the class to acquire the field from
        name - the name of the static field
        Returns:
        the wrapped static field

      • getMethod

        public FastMethod getMethod(java.lang.Object o,
                   java.lang.String name)
        Acquires a method wrapper that enables faster reflective invocation
        Parameters:
        o - the instance used to invoke the method
        name - the method name
        Returns:
        the wrapped method

      • getMethod

        public FastMethod getMethod(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                   java.lang.String name)
        Acquires a method in the same fashion as getMethod(Object, String), but for static methods
        Parameters:
        cls - the class to get the method from
        name - the name of the method
        Returns:
        the wrapped static method

      • getConstruct

        public FastConstructor getConstruct(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        Acquires the wrapped DEFAULT constructor of the given class

        Only a no-arg constructor can be wrapped

        Parameters:
        cls - the class to get the constructor from
        Returns:
        the wrapped default class constructor
